# tailwindcss.com llms.txt

> Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework that allows developers to build custom designs efficiently by scanning HTML files for class names and generating the corresponding CSS styles.

- [Font Family Documentation](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/font-family): This page details how to use font family utilities in Tailwind CSS for typography customization.
- [Tailwind CSS Showcase](https://tailwindcss.com/showcase): Showcase various websites built using Tailwind CSS for inspiration and demonstration purposes.
- [Responsive Design Guide](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/responsive-design): Explains how to implement responsive design in Tailwind CSS using utility variants for adaptive interfaces.
- [Box-Sizing Utilities](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/box-sizing): Explains Tailwind CSS utilities for managing box-sizing in web design layouts.
- [Align Self Documentation](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/align-self): Explain the use of align-self utility in Tailwind CSS for flex and grid item positioning.
- [Tailwind CSS Clear Utilities](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/clear): Detailing utilities for controlling the wrapping of content around elements in Tailwind CSS.
- [Tailwind CSS Display Utilities](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/display): To provide documentation on Tailwind CSS display utilities for controlling element display behavior.
- [Tailwind UI Blocks](https://tailwindcss.com/plus/ui-blocks?ref=sidebar): Offer UI components for building websites and applications using Tailwind CSS.
- [White Space Utilities](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/white-space): This page details utilities for controlling the white-space property in Tailwind CSS.
- [Detecting Tailwind Classes](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/detecting-classes-in-source-files): Guide on how Tailwind CSS detects classes in source files for proper CSS generation.
- [Line Clamp Utilities](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/line-clamp): This page provides utility classes for clamping text to a specified number of lines in Tailwind CSS.
- [Flexbox Utilities](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/flex): To provide utilities for flexbox layout control in Tailwind CSS.
- [Justify Content Documentation](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/justify-content): Explain how to use justify-content utilities in Tailwind CSS for flex and grid layout.
- [Dark Mode Implementation Guide](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/dark-mode): Guide on implementing dark mode styles in Tailwind CSS.
- [Tailwind CSS Installation Guide](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/): This page provides installation instructions and guidance for using Tailwind CSS with various frameworks.
- [Justify Self in Tailwind](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/justify-self): Explains how to use the justify-self utility in Tailwind CSS for grid item alignment.
- [Aspect Ratio Utilities](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/aspect-ratio): To provide utilities for controlling the aspect ratio of elements using Tailwind CSS.
- [Max Height Utilities](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/max-height): Provides utilities for setting maximum height of elements in Tailwind CSS.
- [Grid Auto Columns](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/grid-auto-columns): Detailing utilities for managing grid column sizes in Tailwind CSS.
- [Text Decoration Thickness](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/text-decoration-thickness): Explain how to use text decoration thickness utilities in Tailwind CSS.
- [Font Variant Numeric](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/font-variant-numeric): Documenting utilities for controlling numeric font variants in Tailwind CSS.
- [Tailwind CSS Upgrade Guide](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/upgrade-guide): Guide for upgrading Tailwind CSS projects from version 3 to 4 with necessary steps and tools.
- [Grid Row Utilities](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/grid-row): Explain utilities for controlling grid row layout in Tailwind CSS.
- [Tailwind CSS Compatibility](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/compatibility): Provides information on browser compatibility and usage guidelines for Tailwind CSS.
- [Vertical Alignment Utilities](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/vertical-align): This page details Tailwind CSS utilities for vertical alignment of inline or table-cell elements.
- [Tailwind CSS Templates](https://tailwindcss.com/plus/templates?ref=sidebar): Offering customizable website templates built with Tailwind CSS for various purposes like personal, SaaS, and documentation.
- [Break Inside Utilities](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/break-inside): Details utilities to control column and page breaks in Tailwind CSS layouts.
- [Tailwind CSS - place-content](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/place-content): Guide for using Tailwind CSS's place-content utilities for aligning grid content.
- [Tailwind CSS place-self Guide](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/place-self): To explain how to use the 'place-self' utility in Tailwind CSS for alignment in layout.
- [Text Decoration Color](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/text-decoration-color): List utilities for customizing text decoration colors in Tailwind CSS.
- [Preflight Styles Overview](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/preflight): Explain the Preflight base styles included in Tailwind projects to standardize styling across browsers.
- [Tailwind CSS z-index](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/z-index): Explain how to use z-index utilities in Tailwind CSS.
- [Font Style Utilities](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/font-style): Explain how to use font-style utilities in Tailwind CSS for styling text.
- [Text Decoration Styles](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/text-decoration-style): Provides utilities for customizing text decoration styles in Tailwind CSS.
- [Grid Auto Flow Utilities](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/grid-auto-flow): To explain utilities for controlling grid auto-placement in Tailwind CSS.
- [Font Weight Utilities](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/font-weight): This page details font weight utilities available in Tailwind CSS for typography control.
- [Flexbox Flex-Basis Utilities](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/flex-basis): Explain utilities for controlling the initial size of flex items in Tailwind CSS.
- [Styling with Utility Classes](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/styling-with-utility-classes): To explain how to style elements using utility classes in Tailwind CSS for efficient and responsive design.
- [List Style Image](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/list-style-image): This page documents utilities for managing list item marker images in Tailwind CSS.
- [Text Indent Utilities](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/text-indent): Explains how to use text-indent utilities in Tailwind CSS for adjusting text indentation.
- [Grid Column Utilities](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/grid-column): To provide utilities for managing grid column placement and sizing in Tailwind CSS.
- [Line Height Utilities](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/line-height): To provide utilities for managing line height in Tailwind CSS.
- [Object Position Utilities](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/object-position): To provide utilities for positioning content within containers using Tailwind CSS.
- [Tailwind CSS Framework](https://tailwindcss.com/): Tailwind CSS helps developers build modern websites efficiently using a utility-first CSS framework.
- [Tailwind CSS Editor Setup](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/editor-setup): Guide for setting up Tailwind CSS in development editors.
- [Catalyst UI Kit](https://tailwindcss.com/plus/ui-kit?ref=sidebar): Catalyst offers a UI kit with customizable React components built using Tailwind CSS for developers.
- [Justify Items Utilities](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/justify-items): Explain Tailwind CSS utilities for justifying grid items along the inline axis.
- [Tailwind CSS Margin Utilities](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/margin): This page details utilities for controlling margins in Tailwind CSS.
